Protocols/KeyboardControllerDelegate.htm.name: keyboardShown()
Protocols/KeyboardControllerDelegate.htm.abstract: The keyboard has shown up. Showing in has finished.

Protocols/KeyboardControllerDelegate.htm.name: keyboardHides()
Protocols/KeyboardControllerDelegate.htm.abstract: The keyboard currently hides by moving out of view.

Protocols/KeyboardControllerDelegate.htm.name: keyboardHidden()
Protocols/KeyboardControllerDelegate.htm.abstract: The keyboard has hidden. Hiding has finished.

Protocols/KeyboardControllerDelegate.htm.name: KeyboardControllerDelegate
Protocols/KeyboardControllerDelegate.htm.abstract: The delegate of a KeyboardController which gets informed about keyboard appearance changes.
